solution_line_template: She has gotten {haircuts_for_free_ones} haircuts to get {free_haircuts_received} free ones because {haircuts_per_free_one} x {free_haircuts_received} = <<{haircuts_for_free_ones}={haircuts_for_free_ones}>>{haircuts_for_free_ones}

She has gotten {haircuts_towards_next_free} haircuts towards her 6th free one because {haircuts_per_free_one} - {haircuts_away_from_next_free} = <<{haircuts_per_free_one}-{haircuts_away_from_next_free}={haircuts_towards_next_free}>>{haircuts_towards_next_free}
